alert.note: Alert for Northern Black Hills; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 4:12PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Meade and eastern Lawrence Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 412 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tilford, or 9 miles southeast of Sturgis, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Black Hawk, Summerset, Piedmont, Tilford and Dalton Lake. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 37 and 53. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Black Hills; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
